title: 2. IRRI Agronomy Challenge 2: Transplanting Day (20 December 2012)

tasks.task: Operating a machine for transplanting crops
subtasks: Researching the use of machine transplanting over manual methods
Understanding the labor-saving benefits of mechanical transplanting
Learning about the history and adoption of mechanical transplanting in Asia
Preparing seedling mats for the machine transplanting process
Assessing the suitability of the local soil conditions for mechanical transplanting
Handling and operating the machine during the transplant process
Managing machine malfunctions and troubleshooting during operation
Evaluating the success of the mechanical transplanting compared to previous methods
